entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening except snow at times heavy over southern sections. Snowfall amount 15 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
